content:
Behance is an excellent platform for showcasing your work and connecting with other creatives.

It's wonderful to hear that you've rediscovered your passion for painting! Taking a break and coming back to it can be really beneficial, as you may have gained new perspectives and insights that can influence your art.

What inspired you to start painting again after a 5-year break? Was there a particular event, experience, or feeling that drew you back to the canvas?

Also, what kind of paintings do you create? Are you more into abstract, landscape, portrait, or something else?

Sharing your work on Behance can help you get feedback, connect with like-minded artists, and potentially even attract new opportunities. Remember to take high-quality photos of your artwork, write thoughtful descriptions, and organize your projects in a way that tells a story about your artistic journey.

If you need any tips on creating a strong online presence on Behance or have any questions about showcasing your work, feel free to ask!
